item.title: Meta Ray-Bans are getting live translation
item.description:
During Wednesday’s Meta Connect event, CEO Mark Zuckerberg announce a slew of new AI-fueled features for the company’s Ray-Ban collaboration. The most interesting of the bunch is the addition of real-time translation through the glasses’ speakers. Meta explains, Soon, your glasses will be able to translate speech in real time. When you’re talking to someone […]

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg says Meta AI has nearly 500 million users
item.description:
Mark Zuckerberg said today that Meta AI is one of the most used AI assistant across the world with “almost” 500 million monthly active users. Speaking at the company’s Meta Connect event, Zuckerberg said that Meta AI is on track to become the most used assistant across the world. “We’re almost at 500 million monthly […]

item.title: Meta Connect 2024: Quest 3S headset, Meta AI upgrades, Ray-Ban Meta real-time video and more revealed
item.description:
Meta Connect 2024 is starting soon, and with it comes the expectation of reveals and updates to Meta’s latest AI model and metaverse ambitions. The developer-centric event will feature a keynote from CEO Mark Zuckerberg, during which he will likely showcase new hardware and software to support two of Meta’s big ambitions: AI and the […]

item.title: OpenAI just launched advanced voice mode for audio chats with ChatGPT. Here's how to use it - CNBC
item.description:
1. OpenAI just launched advanced voice mode for audio chats with ChatGPT. Here's how to use it  CNBC
  2. OpenAI’s Advanced Voice mode is unavailable in the EU, and now we might know why  TechRadar
  3. OpenAI rolls out Advanced Voice Mode with more voices and a new look  TechCrunch
  4. Voice adds realism, but does AI truly hear you?  Psychology Today
  5. ChatGPT Gets Chattier With New Voice Mode  Inc.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy deals are already popping off ahead of October Prime Day
item.description: Samsung Galaxy deals are already plentiful ahead of October Prime Day. Here are our top picks, including Galaxy Tabs, Galaxy Watches, and more.

item.title: YouTube's new AI chatbot: Ask what videos are about so you don't have to watch them
item.description: YouTube's AI 'Ask' button is finally available.
